author: jking79
body:
Updating CC parameters to improve agreement with previous object reco using ratio timing algorithm setting for rechit kOOT flag.

PR description:
This BackPort modifies the outOfTimeThresholdGains to 3.0 and added EBtimeNconst = 25.5 & EBtimeConstantTerm = 0.85 for CC timing algorithm in 13_1_X.

PR validation:
This PR only changes config values and does not touch code. The affect on object reco of these config changes has been studied.
title: BackPort of "Update ecalMultiFitUncalibRecHit_cfi.py' PR #43152
